website_summaries.verdict: A classic push-up bra by a premium brand in fashion that works best for small cup sizes.
pros: Earns praise for giving a natural-looking lift
Padded cups make small breasts look larger while underwire gives support
Straps can be worn straight or crossed
cons: Not everyone finds this bra comfortable, and some customers complain that the material feels itchy and hot on the skin

customer_reviews.title: Most Flattering and Comfortable Black Bra
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect fir true to size . Material is great quality and provides a very flattering shape and support . Color is a perfect Black. Straps are comfortable do not leave a mark and adjustable . Will be ordering more in every color as a staple for everyday wear. I ordered a 32B i am very petite 4’9 90 pounds and 28 years old if that helps anyone . Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 32b or 34a depending on the brand. I decided to try the nude 32b and it is incredibly flattering. I didn't want a super padded bra or an incredible lift, I just want a nice shape for t-shirts and tank tops. And this bra delivers. Its padded but not alot, the cut is discrete for v-necks and tanks... I am about 5'9 and about 120-125lbs...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Young

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake product, not Calvin Klein
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake! It's not an original CK brand bra. Cheap materials, smells chemical like typical Chinese knock off clothing. On the positive side it is a pretty okay push up bra, not as comfortable as the original ones though.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Soot

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic bra
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. I bought this at the same time as some bras from Third Love, and while those feel different and definitely cost a lot more, I like the simplicity of this one. Bought the same one in black and beige, no sizing differences. Size 34A fit just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe this bra!
customer_reviews.text: I am so HAPPY! I am someone who has struggled with bras fitting me ever since I was 12 years old. I have larger breast that just will not fit correctly into ANY bra, without spilling over. I have spent so much money on "top of the line" bras, only to be let down again. I came across this bra and just thought "I'll give it a go" I really didn't expect anything different, but wow! This is the ONLY bra that has EVER fit my breasts PERFECTLY! I will be buying a second one in black!
customer_reviews.author: BP.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bra with a small amount of lift. I found it blended well under tops as well. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessKateTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Not the same material as all my others in this same style / brand. Perhaps that is my mistake for not double-checking, but it's really hot/scratchy nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but seams are seen through shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good fit, however, definitely not a seamless fit. It can very clearly been seen under a shirt. Definitely not a good look. I would not purchase again based on that fact alone.
customer_reviews.author: lauren terreblanche

customer_reviews.title: My new everyday bra
customer_reviews.text: Bought 32C This isn't the most comfortable bra I've owned, but the push up is incredibly flattering & it's still comfortable enough to wear every day. Fits nice under clothes without lines - I've never had a better bra for a white t-shirt. It's usually so hard for me to find bras with a 32 band size that actually have the cups a normal distance apart. Other major brands tend to have a really narrow gore in lower band sizes, which doesn't work if you're thin but not petite.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable like other CK bras
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Calvin Klein bras, but this one is very uncomfortable. The underwire digs in, the band rubs, and I generally can't wait to take it off when I get home. For only $20 it's not worth returning but I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Diel

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I had to hold my breath as I tried it on... I’m proud to announce that it fits PERFECTLY!! As a woman with smaller-than average breasts, shopping for bras is my least favorite/most frustrating experiences. The fit is slightly snug so you are supported, they make the gals look great, and the low-cut nature of the busts allows for concealed wearing of my favorite low cut tops. This is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: hebesd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I measured myself at 32” and am an A cup; so I ordered a 32 A bra. But when the bra arrived, it was too tight around but the cup was a good fit. So, I figured I should have ordered a 34 A instead; which is what I did. Hopefully it fits. Other than that the bra seems to be constructed well with quality material. I kept the smaller bra to give to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: T. Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. I normally wear a 38D. After reading reviews, I chose to order a 36D and that was the right choice. When I first looked at the bra right out of the package I didn't think it would fit me. The cups looked too big. However, it fits perfectly. I was wrong. Going down from my usual 38 band size to 36 was the right choice with this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Will be making another order soon!
customer_reviews.text: I'd worn out my old bra and was in desperate need for a new one. I normal go to Victoria Secret but I just can't justify spending that kind of money on a bra anymore! I'd never ordered a bra only and took a chance and it turned out great! It's really comfortable and first really great. I will for sure be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a winner but.....
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bra was a winner until I had worn it for about an hour and then the attached tag started to irritate my skin. I adjusted the tag and even cut it off close to the fabric with no improvement. This bra fit and felt great other than that but the tag was a real irritant and made it unwearable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this new bra!
customer_reviews.text: The underwire of my favorite nude bra broke through the cup and was stabbing me in the middle of my work day. Finally, on my break, I ordered this bra. It came very fast and fits like a glove (which I originally was super skeptical about). Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: nice fit. stitching not good
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra as well as the Calvin Klein Perfect Fit Push up bra. But this Calvin Klein Constant push up bra I have had for less than a year, and the inside stitching is coming undone. Not happy with the quality. Love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Try On
customer_reviews.text: Because his other 34C's were a bit tight, I wear a 34C in VS, I didn't try it on knowing that as a push up it would definitely been too tight. I must need a 36C in CK.
customer_reviews.author: HollyVSnoopD&FuzzyC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bra!
customer_reviews.text: No joke the most comfortable bra I've ever owned. Already ordered 2 more. I'm vert skinny and an A cup. I thought that finding a flattering woman's bra that fit properly and was decently priced was impossible. SO glad that I ordered this!
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this bra at first, but the little “pocket” that holds the strap hook broke after less than 2 months of wear. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ware

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect I am always worried about buying A cup bras since they almost never fit but this one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hawley

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra fit perfectly and was beautiful quality! It's so simple and I have zero complaint's. I plan on buying more of this brand and product.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: I love this bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is pretty amazing! Well fitted, nice material. I ordered another one because I was so impressed! True to size!
customer_reviews.author: A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Well made with nice enhancement!
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Klein bras. This is no exception. The material is smooth to the touch and when it’s being worn. The push up pads aren’t exaggerated but do a very nice job of enhancement, especially for a 32B that can use a little help. The sales price was hard to ignore too.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Straps come undone
customer_reviews.text: The straps come undone. I want to return for a full refund, but there's no option to return.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie'sAngel

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love Calvin Klein bras and I hate wearing bras! They are the only bra that I don’t hate wearing. These are fab as well.
customer_reviews.author: BohoMama80

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, fits perfect. I am a 36C and it fits great. One of my favorite bras to wear
customer_reviews.author: Lori Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Calvin Klein Bras for the last 10 years. Now I am very glad that Amazon sells this product way cheaper than Macy's!
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit scratchy
customer_reviews.text: The bra looks great; however it is a bit scratchy. And it fit larger than my Victoria’s Secret bra fits. I’m a 34 D and in VS sizing it’s a perfect fit. With this, it fit a bit big. It looks great though, but no the most comfortable bra.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Great product, item as described, received item in expected amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: True to size, great push and versatile straps!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fitting bra!!! Fits true to size and great plunge for push up effect and you can cross cross the straps to look better underneath certain tops. I bought black 36c and will buy more colors today!
customer_reviews.author: ColeyKlein

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, my old, tan bra from Victoria’s Secret needed to be replaced and I got this one. So glad I did; I’m only a B/C cup but it gave me plenty of support and a nice lift. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with slight hesitation, but I am so pleasantly surprised with this bra! The fit is perfect, the “bare” color couldn’t be any better, and the price was fantastic! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I sized up a tiny bit and it was perfect. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hinckley

customer_reviews.title: It broke in less than 2 months!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra in 36B on June 20th. Today is August 16th and the fabric hook where the metal hook attaches broke today! I have only worn this a couple of times. I wonder if this isn’t a Calvin Klein original.
customer_reviews.author: Tram&Mare

customer_reviews.title: Great Bra!
customer_reviews.text: perfect bra! Was looking for something with a tad bit padding and this is it !
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size. Runs big
customer_reviews.text: This isn't true to size, it runs a little big.
customer_reviews.author: KindleCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a well made push-up
customer_reviews.text: Great push up after having a baby 6 months ago. It’s very comfortable and well made especially for the price. Fits like a $50 bra.
customer_reviews.author: 3Productions2

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy and try
customer_reviews.text: Overall great quality product for a great price...and they even fit as expected. So 👍💯❤️
customer_reviews.author: gilbert gosser

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: Like how it holds them (front and center) more flattering than my other Calvin bras
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This push up is so nice! Definitely nice to wear under lounge wear
customer_reviews.author: Melissa  Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Push Up, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice, seamless design. The padding is more than I'm used to but looks good. Comfortable, even though the straps are thin. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O'Quigley

customer_reviews.title: More luminous material than photos show, with perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, color, quality...will be adding other colors to my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wollerscheid

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn’t feel too thick. It is padded but it still has a natural look to it 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Adalhi Velasco

customer_reviews.title: CK always does it best!
customer_reviews.text: Fit and felt like all of the other CK bras I own. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and very true to size! Very very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Not so
customer_reviews.text: It gave me some rush on my back, the fabric is cheap
customer_reviews.author: Darya

customer_reviews.title: Soft and flattering
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most perfect fit the most true to size I have ever gotten. Very comfortable and soft and very flattering. I am very picky and I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madison

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Constant Push Up Plunge Bra
product_meta.description: A CK classic underwire padded bra with adjustable straps- a must-have addition to your bra collection.
